# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  
**Phone:** 347-491-2955  
**Location:** New York, NY  
**LinkedIn:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)

---

## Summary
Solutions-focused technologist with experience in AWS architectures and automated data pipelines, enhancing application throughput.

---

## Core Skills
- **Programming:** Python, Java, SQL, JavaScript  
- **Databases:** PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, DynamoDB  
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure  
- **Automation:** CI/CD, Docker, Git  
- **Data Processing:** ETL, data modeling, machine learning  

---

## Experience

### Solutions Architect Intern  
**Amazon Web Services (AWS)**, Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
*Jun 2025 – Sep 2025*  
- Automated sentiment-analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records, achieving 5× faster feedback loops.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by 5% and reducing toxicity by 8%.  

### Software Developer Intern  
**WOPLLI Technologies**, Remote, NY  
*Jun 2024 – Sep 2024*  
- Developed API integration scripts, enhancing system interoperability and efficiency.  
- Configured Azure environments, improving deployment speed by 30%.  

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**, New York, NY  
*Feb 2024 – May 2024*  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows, reducing manual workload by 40%.  
- Delivered white glove support on 100+ tickets with excellent service reviews.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA**, Remote, NY  
*Feb 2022 – Aug 2023*  
- Delivered 36 lessons to 200+ learners, maintaining a 96% cohort graduation rate.  

---

## Projects

### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Reduced application time by 60%, boosting weekly applications by 300%.  
- Designed CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment, enhancing code quality.
